keyword: calories in ny strip steak 16 oz
title: Calories in 16 oz NY Strip Steak
meta_description: Discover calories in ny strip steak 16 oz, including protein, fat, full nutrition breakdown per 100 g basis, and preparation tweaks for better tracking.
h1: Calories in 16 oz NY Strip Steak
assumptions: USDA Choice grade, broiled, moderately trimmed fat, no added seasonings or marinades; 16 oz raw weight yields similar cooked weight after trimming.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grade, cut thickness, cooking method, fat trimming, and doneness; values approximate—check labels or use a scale for precision.

quick_answer.text: A 16 oz NY strip steak provides ~1230 kcal and ~113 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Fully trim visible fat before cooking
Grill with 1 tbsp butter per 4 oz

faqs.q: How many calories in 16 oz NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Approximately 1230 kcal for a broiled, moderately trimmed 16 oz NY strip steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in 16 oz NY strip steak?
faqs.a: About 113 g of protein, making it a high-protein choice.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Yes—broiling or grilling keeps calories lower than pan-frying with oil, which can add 50-100 kcal per serving.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 16 oz NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 82 g total fat, including 34 g saturated, depending on trimming and grade.

faqs.q: Are these values for raw or cooked NY strip steak?
faqs.a: Based on cooked weight; raw loses ~20-30% weight during cooking due to moisture loss.
